stores.name: John Doe Artillery
stores.description: Grass by the trickling stream; and, as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants are noticed by me: when I hear the buzz of the little world among the stalks, and grow familiar with the countless indescribable forms of the insects and flies, then I feel the presence of the Almighty, who formed us in his own image, and the breath.

stores.name: Banda Electricals
stores.description: The bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now. When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream; and, as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants.

projects.title: W-Moviez
projects.description: This website was created around the TMDB API. It makes use of API calls to fetch popular movies, Sci-Fi, best R-Rated Movies and allows users to get details on their favourite movies using the search functionality.

projects.title: DUDEY-AI
projects.description: A simple landing page for an AI Chatbot solution. This was my first collaboration with a UI/UX designer @gbemisola on Twitter

projects.title: Linear Clone
projects.description: A Linear clone. Linear helps streamline software projects, sprints, tasks, and bug tracking. It's built for high performance teams.

projects.title: WeBuild

projects.title: Cryptobase

projects.title: Feedback App

projects.title: EZ Contacts
